import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FaInfoCircle, FaQuestionCircle, FaEnvelope } from 'react-icons/fa'; const LandingPage = () => { return (

Welcome to CrickBidders

Your ultimate platform for cricket auctions!

 {/* Cards Section */} {/* About Us Card */} About Us CrickBidders is a dynamic platform designed to bring cricket enthusiasts, teams, and organizers together for exciting online auctions. We help players and teams connect in a way that adds fun and strategic depth to cricket tournaments. {/* How to Use Card */} How to Use
  • Step 1: Sign up as a committee leader, team head, or player.
  • Step 2: Set up your auction or join an existing one.
  • Step 3: Bid on players, track points, and build your winning team.
 {/* Contact Us Card */} Contact Us Have any questions or need help? We're here to assist you. Feel free to get in touch with us, and we'll respond as soon as possible. ); }; export default LandingPage;
